sentence.Network_en: She would have steered agilely up the ladders and left the snakes alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她会灵活地顺着梯子爬上去,远远地躲开这些卑鄙龌龊的人.

sentence.Network_en: Consequently, with flexible decision making enterprise can avoid loss agilely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样就使得决策更具灵活性,能更好的避免损失.

sentence.Network_en: The touch panel can work accurately and agilely.
sentence.Network_cn: 触摸屏做到了触点准确,操作灵活.
